summary: Makes those magical elder scrolls you can't even put down weightless, rather than 20. Includes Dawnguard Support.
descriptionHtml:
Are you tired of lugging around those Elder Scrolls?

This mod simply makes them weightless. If they are so magic that they don't allow you to drop them, they may as well be magical enough so as not to burden your carrying capacity.

Contains 2 files:
[list][*]JaxonzWeightlessElderScrollSkyrim.esp
Use this if you just have Skyrim[/*]
[*]JaxonzWeightlessElderScrollDawnguard.esp
Use this if you also have Dawnguard (you don't need to also useÂ JaxonzWeightlessElderScrollSkyrim.esp)[/*]
[/list]
Contains no scripts. Should be highly compatible and removable without issue.
author: Jaxonz
